title: weex-vue-render feature complement
body: feature implementation for weex vue2.x web render, to catch up with native renders. Some feature's still not completed yet, like richtext supporting, pseudo classes supporting, etc. Most major features such as major components and modules are supported with bugs fixed now. Also support image preprocess, inline style or binding style processing, img lazyloading and other basic exclusive features for web platform. Request to merge into dev branch.

body:

- allows auto play when the number of items is 2
- allows infinite scroll when the number of items items is 2
- ability to disable infinite scroll

Known issue:
- When the number of items is 2,  the loop scroll from item 2 to item 1 will have no animation effect

title: * [Android] Add the ability of disable changing layerType
body: For certain custom weex instance, one can disable the ability of changing layerType by call `WXSDKInstance.enableLayerType(boolean)`. The default value for this flag is true and setting this to false will have performance punishment。

title: about navigator module
body:
i use this module in my app, when the jump(navigator.push) , prompted to select open application of myApp or playground in Android phone.
 a requirement , add replace method,  such as from login page to main page, do not need back.

我用navigator.push跳转页面的时候，安卓端会提示选择’myApp' 或者 ‘playground'应用来打开，是我的配置问题吗？
希望能够增加replace方法，当我从登陆页跳到主页面时，按返回键还可以到登陆页。这种感觉很不好。
如果能加上一个data参数对跳转的页面转参，在页面中，可以通过config.param方式来读取那就更好了。
我是前端开发者。所以希望在js端能处理的事就不要去原生端操作。

title: [android] refactor list sticky implementation
body:
Use list instead of stack to store sticky components and views.
In list, use #updateSticyView(currentStickyPos) to find the current sticky component.

title: * [Android] refactor animation
body:
[Android] Refactor animation using Action and perserve `transformOrigin`'s last time state.

Before this commit, transformOrigin is stateless during a sequence of animation, e.g. tranformOrigin would reset to `50%, 50%` every time if it was not given. This commit respect `transformOrigin` last time state unless it is specified this time. Developers who depends on the wrong implementation may run into a problem.

Potential break changes:
* For Android developer: Those who start animation by invoking AnimationModule, RenderManager, or DomManager directly may run into compiling error or runtimeException.
* For Front-end developer: Those who depends on transformOrigin reset to `center center` after each animation will run into problem.

title: * Docs add toolkit documents
body:
Weex-toolkit has integrated [weex-devtool](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-devtool) and [weexpack](https://github.com/weexteam/weex-pack) 。Now you could use weex-toolkit to debug , preview and build your weex project. And you can  add platform and plugins by weex-toolkit .

 The official website will show only one CLI tool documents for our developers after the updates.

Have a nice development  experience by weex-toolkit 💐🎆.

title: * [jsfm] use Object.seal to replace Object.freeze
body:
`Object.freeze(Object.prototype)` 

Freezing the Object.prototype causes the user cannot rewrite the normal object's toString method, constructor method, etc. Some third-party common libraries can not be used, and inheritance can not be achieved.

The reason is as follows：
[object-freeze-object-prototype-vs-reality](https://esdiscuss.org/topic/object-freeze-object-prototype-vs-reality)

The new way to use the seal method and set an error alert for each attribute to achieve the effect of simulated freeze.
